channel.title: Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 208
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 208 - BL-84/ID-27/Burley/Paul.

item.title: ID-25 West at I-84 (Exit 201)
item.description: ID-25 West at I-84 (Exit 201). Use I-84/ID-25 West for Twin Falls. Use I-84 East for Burley. Kasota Road continues southbound.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25. Use ID-25 east for Rupert; ID-25 west for Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: ID-27 north to Paul at I-84 west to Twin Falls and Boise (Exit 208).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 208
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 208 - BL-84/ID-27/Burley/Paul.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; left for US-30/BL-84 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 West; left for US-30/BL-84 West.

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 211). Use US-30 west for Heyburn and Burley; I-84/US-30 East for Pocatello and Ogden (Utah); I-84 West for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30 in Heyburn.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split in Rupert. Turn right to continue west on ID-25; continue straight for ID-24 to I-84.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West Split in Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West split in Rupert. Turn right for ID-25 to Paul; continue straight on ID-24 for Heyburn and Burley.

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24 East at ID-25 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East at ID-25 in Rupert. Turn left for ID-25 east to Pocatello; right for ID-24 East /ID-25 West to Burley and Heyburn. Use either direction for I-84. ID-25 joins ID-24 east through Rupert.

item.title: ID-24 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 (Meridian Road) at Baseline Road in Rupert. Turn left on Baseline Road to continue east on ID-24 for Heyburn and Burley.

item.title: ID-24 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 (Baseline Road) at Meridian Road in Rupert. Turn right on Meridian Road to continue on ID-24 to Minidoka NWR.

item.title: N Meridian Road at ID-24
item.description: N Meridian Road at ID-24 west to Lake Walcott State Park

item.title: ID-24 East - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 east (Read Ave. at N Meridian) in Rupert.

item.title: ID-24 East - Rupert
item.description: Entering Rupert on ID-24 south. Speed Limit 35 MPH. Rupert is the county seat of Minidoka County.

item.title: ID-24 East - Acequia
item.description: ID-24 east at Acequia junction

item.title: ID-24 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance market on ID-24 east. Distance to Acequia, Rupert, and Burley.

item.title: ID-24 East - Minidoka
item.description: ID-24 east in Minidoka. This is the new style of Idaho state highway shield that has been showing up on Idaho highways in the last few years.

item.title: ID-24 West at Minidoka Jct.
item.description: ID-24 West at Minidoka Jct. Turn right for Minidoka; left to continue east on ID-24 to Norland.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Cassia County/Snake River
item.description: I-84 east at Snake River, Cassia County line

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: I-84 west on Exit 211 offramp. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; turn left for BL-84 West/US-30 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 216 - ID-25/ID-77/Declo/Albion.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25. Use ID-25 east for Rupert; ID-25 west for Twin Falls.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25 in Paul.

item.title: ID-27 North Approaching ID-25
item.description: ID-27 North approaching ID-25 in Paul.

item.title: ID-27 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-27 north. Distance to Paul.

item.title: End BL-84 East at ID-24/I-84
item.description: End BL-84 (Burley and Heyburn) at I-84 west and ID-24. Use I-84 west for Twin Falls and Boise. Use ID-24 for Rupert and Minidoka.

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East Approaching I-84/ID-24
item.description: BL-84/US-30 east approaching I-84 and ID-24. US-30 turns east onto I-84 and the road continues as ID-24 towards Rupert.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: ID-27 north to Paul at I-84 west to Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 Onramp
item.description: BL-84 West/ID-27 North at I-84 (Exit 208). Merge right for I-84 East/Ogden (Utah)/Pocatello. Continue over bridge for I-84 West/Twin Falls and ID-27 North to Paul.

item.title: I-84 West Offramp at ID-27
item.description: I-84 west Exit 208 offramp at ID-27. Turn right for ID-27 north to Paul; left for BL-84 East/ID-27 south to Burley and Oakley.

item.title: I-84 East - Next Services via I-84 and I-86
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 216. This sign shows the next services on I-84 and I-86. The next gas along I-86 is 42 miles (American Falls).

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 211 - US-30/ID-24/Rupert/Heyburn. This is one of the few overheads on Idaho highways outside of the metro. areas.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 211, US-30/ID-24 to Heyburn and Burley

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: US-30/ID-24/BL-84 at I-84 interchange

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84 and US-30
item.description: I-84 west onramp at the eastern terminus of ID-24

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30 Jct.
item.description: End of ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Cassia County/Snake River
item.description: I-84 east at Snake River, Cassia County line

item.title: I-84 East Exit 208
item.description: I-84 at Exit 208, BL-84/ID-27

item.title: I-84 East Exit 211
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 211, US-30/ID-24

item.title: ID-25 West - Minidoka County
item.description: ID-25 west (South 200 East) at Baseline Road. Turn left to continue west on ID-25 towards Rupert and MInidoka.

item.title: ID-25 West at ID-24
item.description: ID-25 west at ID-24. Use ID-24 west for Minidoka. Merge left for ID-24/ID-25 west to Heyburn and I-84. ID-24 and ID-25 join through Rupert.
